Title: Media Glass ( My simple WPF Media Player )
Description: This is my simple WPF media player. I write it for my own. May be you want to use it too.
HomeWiki:
Overview

This is my simple WPF media player. I write it for my own.
I want to get best parts from players I know, make nice player for video and audio, to get rid of 50 % functionality I never use.
May be you want to use it too.

Prerequisites

  • Windows Media Player 10 or higher ( if you install 9.0 or lower it will not work )
    • Windows Media Player 10
    • Windows Media Player 11
    • Windows Media Player 12
  • .NET Framework 3.5 or higher
  • Good Codec Pack. I recommend K-Lite Code Pack or CCCP

Features

  • Plays video / audio
  • Change played video resolution
  • Make snapshots original / what you see size
  • Full-screen mode
  • Simple and intuitive interface

Supported formats

  • Plays almost all Windows Media plays : wmv, avi, mpeg, mp3 , flv and etc.
  • It can't play broken avi
If file doesn't want to play try to use Windows Media Player. If Windows Media Player can't play your file - install good codec pack. If Windows Media Player plays normally and Wpf Media Player has failed, so it is irreparable.

Target Platform

Application has been tested on Windows XP. Perhaps it will work on Vista and Windows 7.
